name: Webpack
description: A powerful bundler that compiles modules and assets into a single optimized bundle.

name: TypeScript
description: A typed superset of JavaScript that adds static type checking to your code.

name: Sass (SCSS)
description: A CSS preprocessor that adds features like variables, mixins, nesting, and partials.

name: Babel
description: A JavaScript compiler that lets you write modern JS and transpile it for older browsers.

name: ESLint
description: A tool to analyze your code for potential errors and enforce coding style rules.

name: Prettier
description: An opinionated code formatter that ensures consistent code layout.

name: Husky
description: A tool for managing Git hooks — used here to run checks before commits.

name: Jest
description: A testing framework for JavaScript with a focus on simplicity and code coverage.

name: npm
description: The Node package manager used to manage dependencies and run scripts.

name: webpack-dev-server
description: A development server that provides live reloading and fast feedback.

description: A plugin that extracts CSS into separate files for production builds.

description: Injects CSS into the DOM via style tags — used in development.

name: css-loader

name: ts-loader

name: babel-loader
description: Lets Webpack pass JS through Babel for transpilation.
